result.adr_address: Hong Kong, Kowloon Tong, Tat Chee Ave, 80號Shop L1-34, Leval 1, Festival Walk
result.formatted_address: Hong Kong, Kowloon Tong, Tat Chee Ave, 80號Shop L1-34, Leval 1, Festival Walk
result.name: Mad for Garlic (Festival Walk Store)

reviews.text: It is a nice Asia-influenced Italian restaurant with pizzas, pastas, risottos and more. Its highly recommended Garlic Snowing Pizza is nicely flavored with fried garlic pieces, pineapples and meat, while the crust is delicious. The fried rice was okay. The garlic cream fettuccine was disappointing, while the pasta is undercooked, the sauce seems watered down and garlic cream is more of a foam. On the other hand, the restaurant is open roof to the inside of the shopping mall, but it feels slightly more isolated than expected. The ambience is more youthful and is suitable for a meet-up.

2019-03-31
Great food and good service.  Steak with loads of garlic is their chef’s recommendation.  It’s good but not the best steak in town.  My recommendation is Grilled Pork Belly Ssam.  Looked super dry but it was soft, tender and juicy.  It’s texture was like ribs and also tasted so.  The Garlic Snowing Pizza was also good with a whole lot of garlic and cheese.  Be sure you like both before you order.  The shrimps on pizza were not fresh but frozen ones.  They were literally tasteless and should either be replaced or removed.  Now they added nothing but dissatisfaction.
Staff are super attentive, food tastes great, prices are great for lunch and a little pricey for dinner but it's worth it! Nice atmosphere to dine in and it isn't too loud

The Garlic fried rice and pizza are super yummy!! However, i was disappointed with the quality of the service. We went there during afternoon and the restaurant was not full at all. However, the staff only allow us to sit for 1.5 hour while no one was waiting. They strangely took away our plates even though not necessary. They didn't explain properly  how to eat the tiramisu. Although gud was on good quality, overall the experience was disappointing. Unfortunately.
Garlic not too strong and good service

result.name: Mad for Garlic (Festival Walk Store)

reviews.text: It is a nice Asia-influenced Italian restaurant with pizzas, pastas, risottos and more. Its highly recommended Garlic Snowing Pizza is nicely flavored with fried garlic pieces, pineapples and meat, while the crust is delicious. The fried rice was okay. The garlic cream fettuccine was disappointing, while the pasta is undercooked, the sauce seems watered down and garlic cream is more of a foam. On the other hand, the restaurant is open roof to the inside of the shopping mall, but it feels slightly more isolated than expected. The ambience is more youthful and is suitable for a meet-up.
每個餐都跟沙律/餐湯+飲品招牌意大利薄餅（$128）餅底夠薄夠脆，侍應會喺薄餅送到時，即席磨上芝士絲，見到由無變成滿滿嘅芝士絲，實在興奮炸蒜片絕對係焦點，焗過嘅蒜片十分香噴噴，滿足到你嘅嗅覺同味覺。

2019-03-31
Great food and good service.  Steak with loads of garlic is their chef’s recommendation.  It’s good but not the best steak in town.  My recommendation is Grilled Pork Belly Ssam.  Looked super dry but it was soft, tender and juicy.  It’s texture was like ribs and also tasted so.  The Garlic Snowing Pizza was also good with a whole lot of garlic and cheese.  Be sure you like both before you order.  The shrimps on pizza were not fresh but frozen ones.  They were literally tasteless and should either be replaced or removed.  Now they added nothing but dissatisfaction.
食物可以，但用餐有限時，如果要聚舊，那最好不要選這處了。
只有意粉比較好味，主要是那天我身体不舒服，也就沒胃口，但蒜片是炸得不錯的，沒有了那种難聞的味道。
